body: I managed to get things running fine locally, though I had to also move a `COPY` command, let me know if there's an issue with that. The reason I had to move it was the `postinstall` command looks for `vendor.webpack.config.js`, but threw an error since it hadn't been copied to `app` yet. As far as I can tell this should be okay, but I may be wrong.
